description:
* Based on a French comic book series by http://anidb.net/cr53544 [Tony Valente].
http://anidb.net/ch98083 [Seth], http://anidb.net/ch94709 [Melie], and http://anidb.net/ch94708 [Doc] encounter new allies in Caislean Merlin – the stronghold of the Knights-sorcerers, a group that is also after the monster called Némésis. Seth`s adventure accelerates with the addition of http://anidb.net/ch105365 [Ocoho], a girl who hopes to become a Knights-sorcerer, a farewell with Melie and Doc, and a clash with the malicious Merchant-Barons! And all this with the Inquisition still at his heels!
Source: Official website

REGULAR.description:
Seth has set out on a new adventure to unravel the mysteries of Radiant. His destination is Caislean Merlin, the city of the Knights-sorcerers. He boards Alma`s airship and, along with Alma and her new helpers, Bossman and Jiji, heads for the continent of Cyfandir. Meanwhile, Dragunov, the Inquisition captain, visits the Inquisition`s holy land at General Torque`s order. He`s prepared to face capital punishment, but...
Source: crunchyroll

Seth parts ways with Alma and her helpers, and arrives at the continent of Cyfandir alone. There, he has an unexpected encounter with the Merchant Barons, who have come to this land to exploit its resources and see the sorcerer Seth as an enemy. Seth is backed into a corner by the Merchant Barons` fierce attacks, but finally escapes with Grimm`s help. When Seth finally arrives in the city, he`s surprised to see both sorcerers and ordinary humans living together... and admiring the Knights-sorcerers together.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Encounter in the Rain: Mist

REGULAR.description:
Seth runs into Melie and Doc, but Melie is cold toward him and quickly leaves. So Seth heads to the castle to look for clues about Radiant, but he`s turned away at the gate. Then he encounters a myserious old man named Myr who leads him to the Knights-sorcerers` stables. There he meets an aspiring Knight-sorcerer named Ocoho, who`s preparing to set out on a mission to defeat a Nemesis. Seth is mistaken for a newbie and taken along...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La capitale des chevaliers: Caislean Merlin
The City of Knights: Caislean Merlin

REGULAR.description:
When the battle threatens to ruin farmland, Seth does his best to protect the crops. Ocoho is impressed and casts defensive magic to help him, but she`s reprimanded for going against orders. But then Queen Boudica appears and praises Ocoho for protecting the land as the legendary sorcerer Merlin did. The farmers also say that a spirit called the Dullahan started appearing in the area around the same time as the Spectral Nemesis...
Source: crunchyroll

Seth visits Melie at the inn where she`s staying, but she treats him coldly. Seth had left Artemis on his own because he didn`t want to hurt his friends with the power he couldn`t control, but Melie wanted Seth to have faith in her as his friend; the two of them just can`t see eye to eye. Seth is left with nowhere to go, but then Ocoho asks him to train with her, offering to look in the castle library for information on Radiant in return. But Seth still isn`t sure if he should be making new friends...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Amaoto Shizuka ni Kokoro wa Tooku: Rain

REGULAR.description:
Ocoho`s search for information on Radiant isn`t going well, so Seth makes up his mind to sneak into the castle archive himself. For some reason, even though he`s never been inside the castle before, he feels as if he knows it. He takes a hidden passage he`d seen before in his dreams, and beyond it, he sees a Nemesis and a young man. The young man reacts with fear upon seeing Seth`s horns and traps him within a barrier. While Seth is trapped, every move he makes is matched by a Spectre Nemesis somewhere in the world outside...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ka no Mono no Na wa: Diabal
Le nom de cet homme: Diabel

REGULAR.description:
A Nemesis that looks like Seth has appeared, brought forth by a mysterious man who lurks deep beneath the castle. He is the one who has been making the Spectre Nemesis appear. After making his way beneath the castle, Seth was attacked by a Nemesis and blacked out, finding himself trapped within the realm of his own consciousness. He comes face to face with his memories, which causes him to awaken in his berserk form.
Source: crunchyroll

The mysterious man, who claims to know Piodon, is terrified of Seth`s out-of-control form and ends up being blown out of the castle. When Seth disappears, Melie, Doc, and Ocoho follow traces of Fantasia to find him, but they end up in a forest that no one has ever escaped after entering. As they make their way through the forest, they find Myr and his wife Jill, who have been protecting Seth. He has become lost within the realm of consciousness, called Sidh, and refuses to leave because he`s afraid of his own power...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Seth in the Forest of Time: Caillte
Seth, dans la forêt du temps: Caillte
Toki no Mori no Seto: Caillte

REGULAR.description:
Ocoho and Melie are blamed for disobeying orders in the previous battle, but Mordred saves them by telling the queen that it was all Lord Brangoire`s mistake. Seth, meanwhile, remains in Caillte`s forest, training so that he can learn to control his power. With the help of Myr and Jill, he learns how to harmonize with Fantasia, but when he tries to control the darkness inside him...
Source: crunchyroll

Led by Lord Brangoire and Lord de Gulis, the Knights-sorcerers set out to battle a Nemesis that has appeared in the surrounding farmland. Ocoho is the only one who notices that the enormous Nemesis is actually a composite of several Echo Nemesis, which then split apart and begin rampaging as countless individuals. Ocoho calls for help, but no one can hear her, and she`s left with no choice but to disobey orders again. Using a powerful Gysoni spell, she forcibly takes over command from Lord Brangoire...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Qualifications of a Knight: Quality

REGULAR.description:
Seth is still unable to control his rampaging power. He tries to suppress it by force, but only ends up closer to being completely engulfed by it. But by thinking about all the bonds and relationships he`s forged up to this point, Seth experiences an awakening and learns to use his power to create rather than destroy. He also learns that if he can use his power of creation correctly, the world that was once filled with pixies could be reborn. So Seth then leaves Myr with a new hope...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: À présent, ressens le monde: Resonance

REGULAR.description:
As the town bustles in preparation for the upcoming ordination ceremony, Ocoho leaves quietly, avoiding being seen. Lord Brangoire grows suspicious of her behavior and attacks her. Melie stops him, but is shocked to see Ocoho starting to call forth a Spectre Nemesis. Seth stops Ocoho when she appears to go on a blind rampage, but when she returns to her senses, she doesn`t remember anything that`s happened. It`s clear that someone is manipulating her, but who is it?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La vérité est comme une malédiction: Ocoho
Shinjitsu wa Noroi no You ni: Ocoho
The Truth Is Like a Curse: Ocoho

REGULAR.description:
The one manipulating Ocoho was Mordred, but Mordred claims that Queen Boudica herself is a traitor with connections to a shady organization called the Faithful of the Hermit. Ocoho is left unsure what she should believe, but Seth`s advice helps her make a decision. On the day of the ordination ceremony, Ocoho exposes the truth and questions Queen Boudica in front of everyone, declaring that some of the knights are traitors.
Source: crunchyroll

The ordination ceremony has been called off. Queen Boudica refuses to surrender and leads her forces in a do-or-die resistance. The Knights-sorcerers charge into battle, but they face a crisis when they lose the ability to use magic due to the strange machine supplied by the Merchant Barons. Meanwhile, Seth finds Diabal again underneath the castle, and Diabal tells him they are something like brothers. also, Doc finds a book called "Book of Truth" in the castle archive and hopes it will hold a clue to the location of Radiant, but then...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le lieu de la bataille décisive: Battlefield

REGULAR.description:
Diabal started cooperating with the Faithful of the Hermit in order to escape Piodon`s pursuit and protect his hiding place. Through the realm of consciousness, Sidh, Seth learns that a war has broken out above ground. He hurries back to the surface, but Melie is caught by Dragunov as bait to lure him. Meanwhile, Ocoho leaves the battlefield to follow Mordred and Sagramore... only to find them boarding the Merchant Barons` airship. When she does the same, Mordred reveals a shocking fact.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La mélodie de la destruction, l`invitation en enfer: Harmonizium
Led to the Abyss by a Melody of Death: Harmonizium
Naraku e Sasou Horobi no Shirabe: Harmonizium
奈落へ誘う滅びの調べ -Harmonizium-

REGULAR.description:
Mordred is revealed to have no emotions. He had infiltrated Caislean Merlin as a child and spent his life there creating chaos in anticipation of this day, all on his father`s orders. His father, Baron Doussant, has been working toward the goal of making all infected people into slaves. Back on lang, Queen Boudica flies into a rage and attempts to destroy the machine that`s negating Fantasia, but Santori`s attack drains the last of her energy. Ocoho is captured, and Sagramore crosses swords with their childhood friend, Mordred.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La vie ne tient qu`à un fil: Tragedy
The Light of Life Is Extinguished: Tragedy

REGULAR.description:
Dragunov had been told by General Torque that capturing Seth was his only objective, and that a military intervention was not his wish. But even after Dragunov reports that he has Seth, the Inquisition warships begin to bomb Caislean Merlin. Dragunov defies orders to join his former squadron and try to stop the war. Meanwhile, Seth takes on Santori, but is overwhelmed by his immense strength. Then a mysterious figure descends upon the battlefield...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kuroki Ryuu wa Maiorita: Pen Draig
L`arrivée du dragon noir: Pen Draig
The Black Dragon Descends: Pen Draig
黒き竜は舞い降りた -Pen Draig-

REGULAR.description:
The mysterious knight turned out to be Doc trapped in a suit of armor along with several memory stones. The soldiers race to rescue the queen, but Verone`s petrifying ability impedes them. Santori attempts to have some fun in his battle with Seth and ends up causing him to go berserk. Santori then talks about using people as if they were tools, causing him to explode with rage. Ocoho and Melie are also boiling with resentment in their respective battles against Doussant and Liselotte.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kagayaku wa Hito no Ishi: Resistance
La volonté des gens scintille: Resistance
The Will of the People Shines Bright: Resistance

REGULAR.description:
Cornered by Ocoho, the Merchant Barons show their true colors. It seemed this would be the end of the battle, but the when the Inquisitor Ullmina learns that Santori has been lost, she has an even more powerful Harmonizium dropped into the forest. The Fantasia there begins to disappear, and the soldiers under the control of Ullmina`s powerful miracle close in on the castle wall. Seth hurries to the forest, concerned about Myr and Jill, and he finds Myr in a state of despair. His grief over losing what was most precious to him then turns to intense rage...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Can`t Hear Your Voice: Myrddin
Je n`entends pas ta voix: Myrddin
Kimi no Koe ga Kikoenai: Myrddin

REGULAR.description:
Engulfed by despair, Myr sets out to on a rampage to destroy everything. Seth responds to Myr`s rampage by flying further out of control, and ends up captured by Ullmina. As the biggest crisis yet closes in, Ocoho grills the disheartened Queen Boudica on who she truly is. Encouraged by Ocoho`s words, Queen Boudica gets back on her feet to destroy the Harmonizium. With the help of Grimm and Dragunov, Melie rescues Seth, who returns to his right mind and sets out to stop Myr`s rampage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Bouquet of Flowers for This Land: Fantasia
Kono Daichi ni Hanataba o: Fantasia
Une gerbe pour ces terres: Fantasia

REGULAR.description:
The thing that finally stops Myr`s rampage is a memento Seth found, left behind for him by Jill. Seeing new life growing before him, Myr finally finds hope again. After beginning to question the Inquisition`s intentions through this war, Dragunov returns to Bome to question General Torque. The long battle is over. All the people of Caislean Merlin gather as Queen Boudica declares an end to old conventions and appoints a new queen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mirai wa Kimi to Tomo ni: Eternity
The Future Is with You: Eternity
